title: Interpretation of seeing colors in a dream according to each color

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about colors in a dream In different situations, dreams are curious to know their interpretation. It is possible that you think they are telling you about the future, or they may be a message to you from God, or they may be dreams, and dreams are either real visions or self-talk, and it is better not to occupy our minds. With the necessity of searching for an explanation for every dream we see, it may be an ordinary dream that has no meaning. Meaning of dream. So look at the interpretation of trusted commentators such as Ibn Sirin and Ibn Kathir. Today's encyclopedia provides you with an interpretation of colors in a dream through this article. Colors in a dream It is mentioned in verses 43 and 44 of Surat Yusuf: “And the king said, ‘Indeed, I see seven fat cows being eaten by seven lean ones, and seven green ears of corn and a young one Oh, dry land “The leaders gave me a fatwa regarding my visions, if you were to interpret the visions. They said, ‘It is nothing but dreams. And we do not interpret dreams with knowledgeable people.’” And in verse 46 of Surah Yusuf: “Job Al-Siddiq, we saw that in the seventh sin that I committed, seven fainting and seven greening. Our master Joseph, peace be upon him, was the most skilled people in Interpretation of visions and dreams. Narrated by Al-Bukhari on the authority of Abu Hurairah that the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, said: Except that prophecy remained part of prophecy. They said: What is good news? He said: Good vision. The good visions that God provides to His righteous servants, He gives them good news and warns them of many things. Interpretation of a dream about colors in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing the color blue in a dream. This color reflects a person’s inner peace with himself and his world. It symbolizes stability and contentment. Calm shades of blue always evoke peace, tranquility, peace and reconciliation with oneself and the surrounding world. The color blue also shows a sense of self-confidence. If you see yourself walking in a body of water such as the sea or other objects, it is characterized by a calm and beautiful blue color. You are a person who dreams of and aspires to stability and security. If an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream, she is wearing blue clothes. This means that they will be officially online. And if the connected girl sees that she is taking off the blue clothes? She will face trouble from her partner. If someone sees that he has lost his blue-colored things. This indicates that he feels lost and that he is not satisfied with his situation. Interpretation of seeing the color red in a dream: The color red expresses feelings of warmth and love between the two partners, as it often expresses feelings of stress and tension. It is a fiery color. If you see red roses in a dream, it means that there is a lot of passion, love and affection between you and your lover. If you see that you received a red gift from one of the people between you, then there is disagreement or feelings of hatred. This indicates that your relationship will improve soon.If you see blood in your dream. This is a bad dream and has no meaning. If you see that the walls of the house in which you live are painted red. This indicates that problems will arise between the members of this house. And if you see the color red in your dream clearly. This indicates that you will face the count

title: Interpretation of seeing meat in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Sirin, and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing meat in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen is of two types: white meat and red meat, that is, animal meat and bird meat, and both have many benefits, the most important of which are: proteins, phosphorus, zinc and a high percentage of vitamin A. They help the body to build, especially in young children, and help adults store calcium and iron. They are useful and nutritious, but their abundance increases weight. When cooking it, you must cook it well for fear of diseases and should not eat it every day so that it is in a daily rhythm so that the percentage of cholesterol and fats in the blood does not increase, especially in adults, because today we will learn about an article on the interpretation of seeing meat in a dream by Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of seeing meat in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. The dream interpretation scholar Ibn Sirin says: Whoever sees cooked meat in his dream, his dream indicates that God has mercy on him. If you dream of raw meat, this indicates that there are problems on the way to the dreamer and may indicate that he has diseases. When a person sees in his dream that he is eating sweet meat, this vision is good news that God will compensate him for the troubles he faced in his life with a lot of money. Dreaming of eating sheep is a sign that the dreamer will soon receive an inheritance. As for eating camel meat in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will receive money from one of his enemies. If the camel meat in the dream is raw, this means that the dreamer has wronged a woman. If a person sees in his dream that he is buying human meat, this means that he is eating from someone else’s money. It indicates Dreaming of beef indicates a disease that afflicts the dreamer. Tender meat in a dream indicates the approach of the term. Minced meat indicates the emergence of problems in the fortuneteller's life. Interpretation of seeing meat in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi's interpretation. The dream interpretation scholar Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi believes that meat in a dream symbolizes the presence of a lot of money that the dreamer will obtain but lose. Whoever sees in his dream that he is cutting tender meat, this means that he suffers from a serious illness. The dream of yellow meat also indicates illness and disease. The unpleasant interpretation is the dream of cutting meat at home, as it is a sign that this house is exposed to many problems. Seeing meat in the dream of an unmarried person indicates the approach of his marriage. The promising dream is a dream in which he eats slices of meat, which is a sign of the collapse of the problems and concerns that the dreamer faces. Whoever sees in his dream that he is eating grilled beef, his dreams indicate that God Almighty will deliver him and save him. If the meat that the dreamer ate in the dream was raw, this indicates that the dreamer will face problems and diseases. Buying meat from a butcher in a dream indicates that the dreamer will face many problems. If a person sees in a dream that he is eating white meat, then His dreams indicate that there is a lot of money on its way to him. Eating raw meat in a dream indicates that the dreamer is eating from the money of orphans or earning a living in illegal ways. Interpretation of seeing meat in a dream according to Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation. From the point of view of the scholar Ibn Shaheen, who

title: Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream for single and pregnant women

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream for single, married and pregnant women The dream of seeing gold is considered one of the most famous dreams of all time. On the contrary, you rarely find someone who only dreams of gold, despite its beauty, cost and precious value, it can bring bad and harmful interpretations to people and for more interpretations of seeing gold in a dream, the next article.Interpretation of seeing gold in a dreamWhoever sees in his dream that he is wearing here Gold with gold, and God knows best, as the sleeper suffers from imprisonment, illness, or restrictions, and God knows best. As for whoever sees gold in his dream, in its raw form, this indicates that the sleeper is about to discover or has already discovered a new talent that he loves. Interpretation of seeing signs of gold in A dream: Whoever sees signs of pure gold in a dream, these signs usually carry an interpretation that the sleeper will achieve great success. Interpretation of seeing a piece of pure gold: Whoever sees in his dream a strong and solid piece of gold, this solid piece usually indicates that the sleeper is ignoring his work and important things that can change the course of His life is forever. As for whoever sees that he is wearing two bracelets of gold and silver, they carry bad omens, and something will soon befall the sleeper, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a gold fish in a dream: Dreaming of a gold fish is one of the most common dreams of golden doors, and it is good leather because it indicates success and prosperity. Interpretation of seeing gold for women: But if a woman sees that she is wearing a golden crown, the interpretation of the dream is that she will marry a very rich man, but he is cruel and unfair and oppresses her. But if a woman sees that she dreams of a golden plate, but it breaks, this means that one of the people or patients around her will die. Different interpretations of gold in a dream. Whoever sees in his dream that his eye turns to gold here means that the sleeper will lose his sight, and God knows best. Whoever sees in a dream that his hand has become gold, the interpretation of the solution means that something bad will happen to him and he may lose the ability to move his hands. As for the dreamer He tries to hide the gold. This means that the sleeper is trying to hide some secrets. But if the merchant sees that he has a golden crown on his head, then the gold here indicates that the merchant will unfortunately lose his business. As for whoever sees in his dream that the word gold has changed, this means that God knows the lack Or a lack of goodness and blessing in one’s livelihood, children, or wife. Unfortunately, gold in a dream is one of the things that carries bad and harmful interpretations and the possibility of problems arising or appearing, losing things, losing people, or changing the situation from good to bad.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing metal in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing metal in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing metal in a dream can indicate the collapse of worries and fears that appear to the fortuneteller in the coming days. Also, seeing metal in a dream and making it shows the hard work that the dreamer is doing and it also shows exhaustion and fatigue. It also Seeing metal in a dream indicates many different situations that the dreamer experiences in his life, and it may indicate happiness, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing metal in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is melting metal and it will not melt, this indicates her close marriage with one of his family members. Also, seeing metal in a dream on unbuilt land indicates the sins that an unmarried girl will commit in the coming period. Also, seeing a lot of metal in the garbage indicates a serious illness that she will enter, and God knows best. Seeing heavy metal in a dream indicates the collapse of the dreamer’s problems. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is carrying a metal, this means that she will achieve her goals. Also, seeing a metal in a dream indicates the collapse of one’s problems and anxiety and also shows business The good deeds that one does. Also, seeing metal in a dream for a married woman indicates the collapse of the disputes that occur in her life between her and his wife, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing metal in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman dreams of seeing heavy metal, this indicates the cessation of pain during Pregnancy, also indicates a lot of happiness. Also, seeing metal in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that her husband will participate in a new and difficult job and also indicates charitable work. Interpretation of seeing metal in a dream for a manIf a man sees in a dream that he is throwing heavy metal, then this vision indicates On the good deeds that he performs, and indicates that he will participate in a new work. If a single man dreams that he sees metal, this indicates his close marriage to a good and beautiful girl. Also, seeing metal in a man’s dream indicates hard work and the high status in which he shines, and God I know. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will answer you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing urinating in front of relatives in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing yourself urinating in front of relatives in a dream. The interpretation of seeing yourself urinating in front of relatives in a dream often shows positive signs for the dreamer, and the vision may indicate that the dreamer will soon recover and enjoy good health in life and may also indicate that the dreamer will gain a lot of good if he urinates Frequently without shame in front of his relatives, or the vision shows that the dreamer will find someone to help him at work in his life or in his marriage, and other interpretations vary according to the marital status and according to the dreamer himself. See also: The toilet in a dream. Interpretation of seeing urinating in front of relatives in a dream. Interpretation of seeing urinating in front of relatives in a dream. Seeing urinating in front of relatives in a dream. Relatives who wear a lot of clothes in a man’s dream are interpreted positively, because when a man sees himself urinating on one piece of clothing after another, this indicates that this dreamer will try to prove himself at work and seeing him urinating on different clothes suggests that he is moving from one job to another. When the dreamer sees that he is urinating in front of his close relatives, but he was very different and felt very ashamed, this indicates some problems that will appear soon, and God knows best. See also: Pregnancy in a dream. Interpretation of seeing urinating in front of relatives for a single girl. The interpretation of seeing urinating in front of relatives varies according to the condition of the girl herself, as If an unmarried woman urinates in front of her relatives in a dream and is ashamed of her relatives while urinating in front of them, this means that certain things will come down and the girl will be ashamed of these matters. Many. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is urinating in front of her relative and feels very ashamed, this may mean a strong friendship and closeness with that person in her life. Seeing an unmarried girl urinating in front of a member of her family and not speaking to him fully, means that this unmarried girl will have Strong work friendships or there may be a friendship with this young man, and God knows best. It also indicates that an unmarried woman who dreams that she is urinating in front of her relatives and was very shy means that she is afraid of what she did and does not want to appear in front of everyone. Urinating shyly in front of relatives indicates that the woman The single woman who is dreaming has a secret in her life, but soon her relatives find out. See also: Penguin in a dream Interpretation of seeing a married woman urinating in front of relatives in a dream Seeing a married woman urinating in front of relatives has many of the following interpretations: If a married woman sees in a dream that she is urinating a lot in front of her husband He was not interested in that, as this indicates that the married woman is trying to protect her home and her husband from the failure of their lives. In a dream, when a married woman sees herself urinating in front of her parents and they are trying to prevent her from this act, this indicates the existence of an unhappy relationship between the married woman and her parents and she is thinking about how to do With that. She is free from problems. When a married woman sees that she is urinating in front of her friends or relatives and feels very ashamed about it, this indicates that there are family matters that will affect many people now or in the future, and God knows best.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dead person in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about seeing Ibn Sirin feeding a dead person in a dream and seeing a dead person feeding in a dream shows a lot of goodness that brings goodness to the seeker, and spoiled food shows a lack of money and poverty and may indicate the death of blessings. The dream of feeding the dead in a dream has many interpretations that many have not realized, because this The dream leaves behind many fears and anxieties, because death is one of the things that disturbs some people when they see it in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about feeding the dead by Ibn Sirin: Dreaming about eating with the dead is good for one’s work and for a good partnership. Seeing eating with the dead and corruption indicates a lack of life. Seeing the dead is a good thing for one’s work and good partnership. Feeding a relative means a good life and good visions. Seeing eating with a dead grandmother is a sign of increasing blessings in the dreamer’s life. Seeing someone in a dream eating food from the dead and not eating it is a sign of poverty. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dead person bathing in a dream for a son Sirin and Al-Nabul Interpretation of a dream about feeding the dead for a man: Eating with the dead in a dream is a sign of longevity. A dream about eating with a stranger is a sign of estrangement and travel. Seeing food with the dead up close indicates goodness and happiness. Eating with the dead grandfather in a man’s dream is a sign of The good life. Seeing a man eating with an unknown dead person is evidence of estrangement and travel. Interpretation of a dream about feeding the dead for single people: A girl eating in a dream with a dead brother is a sign of weakness. Seeing a girl eating rice with the dead indicates good character and happiness. See also: Interpretation of a dream Seeing eating with the dead in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of feeding the dead for a married woman: If a married woman sees herself eating rice with the dead, this indicates stability and happiness. If she sees that she is eating with the deceased grandmother, this indicates her money and money. Interpretation of the dream of feeding the dead for a pregnant woman: See Also: Interpretation of dreams to see the laughter of a dead person in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq & # 8211; My Magazine: Interpretation of a dream about feeding the dead in Nabulsi: If one sees in a dream that he is eating bread with the dead, this indicates that he will obtain a lot of money. If one dreams of eating uncooked meat with a dead person, this is a sign of death and illness. Seeing yourself eating with the dead Male or female, it is an indication of feelings of anxiety, fear, and tension. Seeing a dead person eating honey with a person means kindness. Seeing yourself eating sweets with the dead is a sign of stability and a bright future.

The dream of feeding the dead in a dream has many interpretations that many have not realized, because this The dream leaves behind many fears and anxieties, because death is one of the things that disturbs some people when they see it in a dream. title: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a living person: seeing a deceased person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the death of someone I knowInterpretation of a dream about the death of a fatherInterpretation of a dream about the death of someone you loveDeath in a dream for someone close to Ibn SirinDeath news in a dreamIf you dream about the death of someone,interpretation of a dream about the death of a husbandInterpretation of a dream about the death of a motherDeath of someone I know in a dreamSeeing the death of a person in a dream is a praiseworthy vision, especially if it is not accompanied by Death by screaming and loud crying, because it indicates a long life, the demolition of his house. And whoever sees in a dream the death of the imam of the country, this indicates the devastation and poverty of the country, and the death of scholars is a disaster. And if he sees the death of a person he knows but does not love, this indicates the end of disputes and disagreements between them. A dream. Death in a dream Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing a person die and come back to life means that this person will commit a series of sins and repent after them. If a person sees in a dream that he died without signs of death such as screaming, crying, or a death shroud, this means that this person will live a long time. And he died for the sake of God. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a brother: If one sees in a dream the death of a brother, this means that the person will obtain a lot of money or a great benefit from this brother. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a sister: The death of a sister in a dream indicates joy, and the death of a relative is a bad and unpleasant omen. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream the death of someone she knows, but without crying or screaming, this means that her marriage is approaching. This is on their way to their wedding. The death of a married person she knows. Ibn Sirin says: If a married woman sees in her dream the death of someone she knows, this means that she will attain great happiness and will obtain a lot of livelihood, or if a married woman sees that her husband has died, but without burying her, this It indicates that her pregnancy is approaching. If she is pregnant, this indicates that God will bless her with a male child. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a living person die by a bullet: Which Qur’anic verse indicates death? God Almighty said (Everything in it is false) and this verse indicates that every person in this world will die at some time, because death has no time, and death can come suddenly and without warning, and death is not known to the old, the young or the sick. Or health in general, as death has forms that can be an accident, suicide, or sudden, since we talked about a small overview of death, we will suffice with this and talk about the interpretation of seeing death in a dream and whether seeing death in a dream indicates good or bad skin. Whoever sees in a dream and dreams that the deceased or dead person greets him or shakes hands with him, then the dream in it indicates that the dead person will enjoy the afterlife and that his reward has come to God and that he is. God honors him, and God Almighty knows best. And whoever sees in a dream that a deceased or dying person grabbed him by the hand and dragged him to an unknown place or a place he does not know, then the dreamer will be affected by money after he loses hope. The vision or dream is long, and God Almighty knows best. And whoever sees in his dream and in his dream that he is speaking or speaking with the dead or the dead or talking with him, this means that the person who had the vision and dream is reconciling, shaking hands, or rejecting the dispute between him and a person. Or a group that was difficult to get along with

title: Interpretation of a dream about a woman smoking cigarettes in a dream and its most important meanings

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of smoking cigarettes for a woman in a dream and its most important effects Smoking is one of the worst things a person does in his life, in addition to causing great harm to human health, and in some cases it leads to death, because it causes damage to the lungs and difficulty breathing. A person must take care of himself and his health and not do anything that can cause him illness and fatigue. It is worth noting that some interpreters saw that the dream has good aspects of it, but there are also those who have determined the evil of the dream and that it is not worthy of praise. Interpretation of a dream of a woman smoking cigarettes in a dream and its most important meanings Interpretations of dreams differ according to the dreamer and what he expects and does in his life, but jurists and interpreters agreed that it is bad to see smoking in a dream and that it does not bring good to each other. As for the married woman, the complete and correct interpretation of the dream is as follows: Seeing a married woman smoking cigarettes in her dream means that there are problems with her husband in her life and that her marital life is unstable. A married woman smoking in a dream with sadness indicates that there are relatives of the woman who want evil for her and seek to create problems with her husband to spoil her life. When a woman sees that one of her sons is smoking, this means that she has bad companions and must be careful of them, or the dream indicates difficulties and problems in the son's life. Anyone who smokes cigarettes in a dream shows that she is facing fears in her life and cannot calm down and feel comfortable. See also: Interpretation of a dream of a person you love ignoring you in a dream for a single and married woman and its interpretation. Interpretation of a dream of smoking cigarettes for a pregnant woman Dreams range between good and evil and are determined by superior interpreters who are trying hard to know the true meaning of the dream and the symbols present in each dream and work to interpret them accurately and in a way that makes the vision come true and seeing a pregnant woman smoking in a dream shows the following: When a pregnant woman smokes in a dream, this means that the woman feels very anxious and afraid for her fetus and this dream is a sign of not thinking about it A lot. Whoever sees in her dream that smoke is coming out of a cigarette in her hand, indicates that she will suffer from danger in her life, and this matter can affect her health. A pregnant woman who smokes cigarettes in her dream indicates that she is facing difficulties and risks in her life and with her husband and that she does not live a stable life. Seeing a pregnant woman holding a cigarette in her hand and not smoking it indicates that she will face financial problems and difficulties in her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream of a person asking for my hand in a dream and its interpretation by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of smoking cigarettes for a divorced woman Smoking in general is not good, whether in real life or in a dream only, because it is undesirable and harmful, and the smell of smoking itself is bad and causes many problems in cities and those around them, whether they are friends or family. , And the interpretation of the divorced woman of her dream that she saw smoking is a sign of the following: Seeing a divorced woman in a dream with cigarettes means that she will face many difficulties, which will be great and difficult for her.

Whoever sees in her dream that smoke is coming out of The cigarette in her hand indicates that she will suffer from danger in her life, and this matter could affect her health. A pregnant woman smoking cigarettes in her dream indicates that she is facing difficulties and dangers in her life and with her husband and that she does not live a stable life. Seeing a pregnant woman holding a cigarette in her hand And not smoking them indicates that she will face financial problems and difficulties in her life. The divorced woman’s interpretation of her dream is that she saw smoking as a sign of the following: Seeing a divorced woman in a dream with cigarettes means that she will face many difficulties, which will be great and difficult for her.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a surprise in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a surprise in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a person in a dream surprising someone he knows well, which indicates happiness and the appearance of news that may make the dreamer happy. If one sees many gifts in his dream, this indicates a pure life full of surprises and good and happy news for the pioneer. Receiving gifts indicates From someone in a dream indicates that the dreamer is loved, healthy and successful. Likewise, if a person sees in a dream a gift from an unknown person, then he opens it and there is nothing in it, this indicates deception. Interpretation of seeing a surprise in a dream for a single womanIf an unmarried girl sees in her dream Many surprises, this indicates her proximity to marriage and surprises in marriage. Likewise, if she sees that a stranger is surprising her, this indicates the deception of one of her close friends, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a gift in a dream for an unmarried woman from an unknown person, this indicates that she She will be engaged to the man she loves. Interpretation of seeing a surprise in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream surprises that happen without her knowledge, this indicates her husband’s betrayal of one of her relatives. Also, seeing gifts and surprises for a married woman portends a new baby that she will give birth to with good and blessed offspring and a long life for the fetus. Perhaps seeing her husband surprising her on her children’s birthdays indicates a happy life, abundant sustenance, and a high status. Seeing many gifts indicates the need to take care of her affairs and exploit her ability in order to achieve success and distinction in her mother’s life. Interpretation of seeing a surprise in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees Her dream is that she is giving a gift to someone, it means that she will give birth and give birth to a female, and God knows best. While they see many gifts and many people surprise them, this indicates the achievement of goals and aspirations, God willing. Interpretation of surprise in a dream for men: If a single man sees many beautiful surprises in his dream This indicates his happiness and close marriage with the girl of his dreams. Also, seeing surprises in a dream means a lot of food, participation in a new and good job, a lot of money, and achieving goals. Also, seeing a stranger offering gifts indicates the deception of one of his close friends around him, and God knows best. Perhaps if a young man suddenly sees a dead person in his dream, this indicates my longing for that person and the extent of his love and respect for him. Seeing a gift of a dress in a dream. If a married woman sees that someone surprises her with a dress in her dream, this expresses the occasions and joys that will happen in her reality. Also, if he sees If a young man surprises his girlfriend or fiancée with a dress and she refuses the gift, this indicates that the young man will fall into misfortunes. Also, seeing an unmarried woman wearing a wedding dress indicates that she is close to marrying the man she loves very much. Interpretation of a dream about a pleasant surprise: Seeing a pleasant surprise in a dream is one of Visions that suggest that the dreamer will hear good news will make his heart happy. Also, seeing joy in the gift in the dream is a sign of the goodness and benefit that one obtains due to contentment. Interpretation of a dream about Eid surprise
